title: XFL Fantasy Preview & Top 10 CRAZY STATS from 2019 (02/06 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
The NFL season may be in the rearview, but football continues this weekend with a 4-game XFL slate! We start by breaking down XFL rules and how they will affect Fantasy, including the double forward pass. ...We reflect on the 2019 NFL season with the Top 10 CRAZY STATS from 2019 (6:00), discussing nuggets about Josh Jacobs, Tyler Lockett, Eagles TEs and more. ... With our XFL season-long draft in the books (47:05), we review the first round picks, including two QBs and former NFL RBs Christine Michael and Cameron Artis-Payne. And we're joined by Emory Hunt of The Athletic (57:30) to break down the XFL Week 1 slate, providing insights on offensive trends, injury updates, DFS value picks and more! ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Previewing the XFL with Fantasy talk including DFS, and going over the 10 craziest stats of 2019!
